resources.string: Please upload the XML file sent to you by the resident.
Please select the location of the folder where you have store all the E-KYC .zip files.

Select the method to authenticate. Choose Folder if you have many E-kyc .zip files in a folder. Eg. Airport, Railway Station, Public Distribution System etc. Choose File if you want to select a single E-kyc .zip file. Eg. Hotels, etc.
